About.paragraph: We are the payments platform that helps local economy thrive by enabling merchants and customers to support one another

Services.name: No Transaction Fees
Services.text: We do not charge either a merchant or a customer any transaction fee - what a customer pays goes into the pocket of the merchants

Services.name: Loyalty Rewards
Services.text: We enable merchants to personalize discounts to serve the needs of each of their loyal customers

Services.name: Data
Services.text: We anonymize and own the transaction data occuring on our platform
